name: Multimedia Viewer Book Source File
summary: An MVB file is a multimedia file format developed by Microsoft to store text, images, audio, and video content. Windows help systems and other applications in early Windows environments, such as Windows 3.x and Windows 95, primarily used MVB files to provide interactive or multimedia-based documentation. MVB files are now mostly obsolete and rarely used in modern applications.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
